comments.comment: Amaya wage wesiyekwa athula gaththa eka maha moda booru wadak kiyala athulatath therila thamai athula me gonagen ain wela inne.yako me wesiwa gaththata wada ara eka waraddak karapu samitha mudunkotuwata samawadeela pawl jeewithe gatha karanam athula iwarai.minisun thamai waradi karanne.namuth ewa hadagena idiriyata niwaridiwa jeewathweemai wiyayuththe.samitha hodha gahaniyak,seelacaara amma kenek.daruwanta adarei,daruwoth samithata pana wage adarei.amaya gonata ekigema duwa unath adare nalu.amayage ammalu duwawa balanne.eki rawm gahala eddi ekige amma gawa inna handa ekita wada achchi ekka adarei kiyala ekima programme ekaka kiwa.thawath athulage surname eka amaya baduwata deela tibunoth shalani tharaks nisa dasun nishan maruwa soya  giya wage belle wela thamai daganna wenne athulata.samithala waraddak karath samajayen horata nambuwak athuwai kare.eka parak katath waradinawa.eth me baduwa meki thamai ekama queen wage hamoma idiriye hasirenne.ane wesa baduwa tho samithage puka tharan wath watinawada gono??? Ekane ubath ekka marry karala iddith divorce una samitha ekka 22anniversary eka samaruwe.ewele uba media wala samithatai athulatai waradi kiyaddi apith ube paththa aran eyalata dos kiwwa marry karapu gahani langa iddi divorce una gahaniyak ekka anniversary ekak ganna eka waradiy anumatha karanna ba kiyala.namuth danui therenne,athulata parakku wela hari aththa therila thamai ubawa reject karala hari deyak kare kuyala.ubala wage gonnunta wagakeemak athi mawak biridhak wenna me athmedi ba.eka eka kalayata maruwen maruwata kollo aran unta athal didi fun eke inna witharai ubalata puluwan.namuth dawasak enawa me hamadekama awasanayak me tharuna kamata awasanayak.edata kawruth na.daruwath na.üëéüëéüëé
comments.author: Madu Perera
